snippet.title: Let's Try Helward: A Tanuki Story - With a Surprise at the End! (feat. @illusorywall )
snippet.description:
Watch more Furry Visual Novels like this one! https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5dr1EHvfwpOM1gDbxnRhlfD7nwmEUI_I

Support what I do by subscribing on Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/SebastianSB

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/269QfMEbkb

(the store page of this game is too adult to link to lol)

Game Description:

Helward is a gay furry romance VN about a fish out of water tanuki named Howl. After a year of an intimate long-distance relationship, he will finally pursue his romantic interest.

Given his propensity for misfortune, many mishaps await Howl in his efforts for love. On top of that, in the territory of Helward secrets and dangers abound. He'll have much to overcome while also juggling secrets of his own.

This story takes place in Helward. A fantastical city on the outskirts of Hell where magic beings, demons, and folks cohabitate.  As Howl's story progresses, more will be unveiled about the history of the city and the lands surrounding it as he encounters new friends and even enemies.
